column2: though lung cancer can also occur in people who have never smoked. The risk of lung cancer increases with the length of time and number of cigarettes you've smoked. If you quit smoking
column3: even after smoking for many years
column4: you can significantly reduce your chances of developing lung cancer.Symptoms
